cyclone.name: JERRY
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-northwest, expected to turn north then northeast toward Bermuda and stay well north of the Virgin Islands
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: None (pass east of Bermuda, no landfall forecast)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch only for Bermuda
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Bermuda; residual swells reaching northern Leeward Islands and Puerto Rico
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (St. Croix not listed in wind-probability table)
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected; occasional breezy conditions possible from outer gradient flow
weather_observation.rainfall: Passing showers possible, generally less than 2 inches
weather_observation.other_hazards: Long-period swells and dangerous rip currents along north-facing beaches
